content:
The Things I Do There are countless activities one can pursue, but I focus on a select few that matter to me: reading books, working out, making money, and being kind to people—especially my family.
Try and Don’t Give Up There’s one guaranteed way to fail, and that’s to stop trying!
summary:
The Things I Do

There are countless activities one can pursue, but I focus on a select few that matter to me: reading books, working out, making money, and being kind to people—especially my family.

Try and Don’t Give Up

There’s one guaranteed way to fail, and that’s to stop trying!
title: What I believe
